name: Bensing et al. v. Moore Trucking, Inc. et al., Appellants

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Bensing et al. v. Moore Trucking, Inc. et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The decree of the court of common pleas is affirmed. See Altman v. Ryan, 435 Pa. 401, 257 A. 2d 583 (1969); Bedminster Township v. Vargo Dragway, Inc., 434 Pa. 100, 253 A. 2d 659 (1969); Firth v. Scherzberg, 366 Pa. 443, 77 A. 2d 443 (1951) ; Restatement of Torts, §822. Costs on appellant.
Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Thomas O. Kubelius, with him Robert Ungerleider and Mary Anne Dell’ma, for appellants.
J aekson M. Sigmon, with him Sigmon, Briody, Bittner & Ross, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Bensing et al. v. Moore Trucking, Inc. et al., Appellants.
Argued April 23, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Thomas O. Kubelius, with him Robert Ungerleider and Mary Anne Dell’ma, for appellants.
J aekson M. Sigmon, with him Sigmon, Briody, Bittner & Ross, for appellees.
October 12, 1971:
